attributes.action: Boycott Euro 2012 on grounds of Tymoshenko Treatment
attributes.additional_details: Ukraine currently has opposition leader Yulia Tymoshenko imprisoned, and is mistreating her contrary to her Human Rights. The current administration are using the 2012 championships as an endorsement of their leadership which cannot be countenanced by the UK government. Germany are considering a boycott along with Sweden and more will likely follow. We should set an example.
